description:
Oozora Akari is one of the new main characters for the Starlight Academy community who debuts in the second half of the anime.
During her early appearances, Akari had long hair and wore a pink bow, due to the fact that she was a huge fan of Ichigo. By Episode 96, Akari`s hair remains layered, but has grown to where it`s medium length.
name: Oozora Akari
